description.narrative: WASH Sector Coordination, which contributes to Sanitation, Wash And Emergencies, Wash â€“ General, Water. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children and their families benefit from safe drinking water, sanitation and improved hygiene practices

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: WASH Sector Coordination

description.narrative: In 2019, SCO, and in close collaboration with the Syria Arab Red Crescent (SARC), and partnership with WASH sector partners optimized available resources for delivery of quality WASH services while remaining accountable to affected / targeted population. The WASH sector reached 4.7 million people through resilience focused interventions, and 2.6 million people through humanitarian focused interventions. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:19/01/2020
